means: 暴徒，威吓者，作威作福的人
赫克托（男子名； 荷马史诗<伊利亚特>中的一勇士名）

sentence.Network_en: She does now and then hector a little.
sentence.Network_cn: 她有时会表现出作威作福的样子.

sentence.Network_en: He had been disturbed by the news of the attack on Hector Coyne.
sentence.Network_cn: 赫克托·科因受袭的消息让他焦虑不安。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 方块J：赫克托(Hector)跟据荷马史诗《伊利亚特》中的记载，他是特洛伊王子也是特洛伊第一勇士。 梅花J：兰斯洛特(Lancelot)英格 …
赫克托耳(Hector)：普里阿摩斯和赫卡柏的儿子，帕里斯的兄弟，特洛亚最勇猛的英雄，为阿喀琉斯所杀。 安德洛玛刻(Andromache)…
赫克托尔(hector):普里阿摩斯以及赫卡柏的儿子,帕里斯的兄弟,特洛亚最彪悍的英雄,为阿喀琉斯所杀。赫楞(hellen):皮卡以及丢卡利翁的.
故事主角赫克特（hector）（Hector）是个恶魔锻造师（Devil Forgemaster），可以使用魔力制造出各种恶魔。原本为吸血鬼之王德古拉（Dracu…

list.abs: The authors avoid a hectoring tone ., 作者们避免了虚张声势的语调.
离离原上草 - 搜搜百科 ... 片长：143 min 导演：巴本科·埃克托 Babenco Hector 编剧： William Kennedy ....novel/screenplay.
where hector was the first of the gang ., 赫克托是队伍的第一个人.
He could not stand her hectoring moralism ., 他无法忍受她居高临下的说教.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late middle English: from the Latin name Hector Originally denoting a hero, the sense later became 'braggart or bully' (applied in the late 17th cent. to a member of a gang of London youths), hence talk to in a bullying way

entry.def: If you say that someone is hectoring you, you do not like the way they are trying to make you do something by bothering you and talking to you aggressively.

example.ex: I suppose you'll hector me until I phone him.
example.tran: 我想若是我不给他打电话，你就会一直威吓我。

sentences.sentence: "Her big brother always bullied her when she was young"
